mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT P.ACTIVITY_IDX) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( (COUNT(DISTINCT V.ACTIVITY_IDX) / COUNT(DISTINCT P.ACTIVITY_IDX)) * 100, 2 ) END AS VERIFY_RATE FROM PLAN_ACTIVITY P LEFT JOIN VERIFY_TABLE V ON P.ACTIVITY_IDX = V.ACTIVITY_IDX AND V.VERIFY_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE) WHERE P.PLAN_IDX = #{planIdx}

SELECT USER_IDX, CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN FIRE_STATE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FIRE_MATCH FROM PLAN_TABLE WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND IS_COMPLETED = 0 AND IS_DELETED = 0
AND USER_IDX = #{userIdx} GROUP BY USER_IDX
GROUP BY USER_IDX HAVING CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN FIRE_STATE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 0
